DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Interaction LX4211 Metformin Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Adults ≥18 ≤55 year age . Females must nonchildbearing potential . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤35 kg/sq Able provide write consent Vital sign within sponsordefined range Use medication , include prescription , overthecounter , herbal tea , supplement within 5 day dose No investigational agent study treatment within 30 day prior Day 1 . No protein antibodybased therapeutic agent within 3 month prior screen Use tobacco product History bariatric surgery gastrointestinal surgery may induce malabsorption History major surgery within 6 month prior screen History serious adverse reaction hypersensitivity metformin LX4211 . History renal disease significantly abnormal kidney function test History hepatic disease significantly abnormal liver function test History active infection within 30 day prior Day 1 History surgical medical condition clinically significant laboratory physical finding Positive urine glucose Screening Use drug alcohol
